summary: When their money scam runs aground, a group of would-be thieves turn to kidnapping in an attempt to blackmail their target.
cast: Jason Lee|Crispin Glover|Burton Gilliam|Xander Berkeley|Pruitt Taylor Vince|Joseph D. Reitman|Steven Chester Prince|Suzanna Urszuly|Diane Klimaszewski|Elaine Klimaszewski|Lin Shaye|Melissa Keller|Mathew Greer|Audrey Marie Anderson|Amber Heard|Brad Dourif|David Wilk|Frank Ford|Patrick Boykin|Ryan Brooks|Steve Conner|Jackson Davis|Dave Kraft|Kimberly Ann Shafer|Michael Sorrells
title: Sexy hasta la muerte
